label: 三浦按針
本: Tokugawa Japan: The Social and Economic Antecedents of Modern Japan . University of Tokyo Press . 1991
著者: Nakane, Chie and Ōishi, Shinzaburō; translation edited by Conrad Totman
説明文: English navigator who served for a time in a capacity that might be called Ieyasu's foreign policy adviser (p. 29). [徳川家康]
